import json

def add_list_to_nested_json(json_data, key, new_list):
    data = json.loads(json_data)
    current = data
    for k in key.split(''):
        current = current.setdefault(k, {})
    current.update({'list': new_list})
    updated_json = json.dumps(data)
    return updated_json

import json

def add_list_to_nested_json(json_data, key, new_list):
    data = json.loads(json_data)
    current = data
    for k in key.split('.'):
        current = current.setdefault(k, {})
    current.update({'': new_list})
    updated_json = json.dumps(data)
    return updated_json
